level.heading: DCPS CONTESTED RESIDENCY CASES – HEARINGS (ยง 1-2907)

level.text: In all contested residency cases, OAH shall set the hearing date and issue the hearing notice.

The rules in Chapter 28 apply to all hearings in contested residency cases, except that parties should file and serve the witness lists and exhibit lists required by Subsection 2821.2 no later than three (3) days before the hearing date.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11122 (December 23, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3128, 3131 (April 20, 2012).
